root.name: ECHO: Secrets of the Lost Cavern
root.description: In prehistoric, 15000 BC, Lascaux Caverns of France a young caveman flees from a lioness. Trapped in an old cave full of ancient cave paintings, Arok begins to reminisce about the miracles of a painter and shaman named Klem. This mysterious traveler had the ability to make cave paintings come to life and control the world around him! Staring at the cave paintings around him: Arok decides that he must find this shaman and finally learn the Secrets of the Lost Cavern.
